name: Lukas Rupprecht
bio: Lukas Rupprecht is a PhD student at Imperial College London, working under the supervision of Peter Pietzuch in the Large-Scale Distribute Systems (LSDS) group. His research focuses on network-aware big data processing, in particular, for SQL-on-Hadoop solutions. More information can be found on his website: http://www.doc.ic.ac.uk/~lr12/.
